description: When you start to talk in the editor, your speech will be converted into text and displayed in the editor.
work_procedure:
To use the voice-to-text feature, follow these steps:

1. Open the editor.
2. Click on the voice-to-text button.
3. Start speaking.
4. Your speech will be transcribed into text and displayed in the editor.
